code:
export default {
  title: 'Internet acquiring',
  desc: 'We have flexible and modular acquiring solution with PAYSUNION will ensure the high efficiency of your payment processes.',
  sub_item_1: "We have set of technologically advanced services for accepting payments on the Internet, aimed at the optimal solution of various business needs of payment service providers.",
  sub_item_2: "Our modular solution has ability for customising and adapting to the needs of each client. Our modular solution provided through the scalable API, in which new functions are added every month that increase the capabilities of your applications.",
  sub_item_3: "We understand how important fast integration and high availability of the service in e-commerce. Therefore, PAYSUNION offers a quick procedure for registering and concluding a contract for servicing a merchant, and ready-to-implement technological solutions for payment cards acceptance for quick integration of merchants. Thus, we will ensure high efficiency of payment processes for your business.",
  benefits: "PAYSUNION Internet Acquiring advantages:",
  benefits_1_title: "Connection within 2 days",
  benefits_1_desc: "Ready-to-implement CMS and SDK modules for mobile applications, functional API",
  benefits_2_title: "24/7 support",
  benefits_2_desc: "We answer by phone or chat",
  benefits_3_title: "Fast money transfer",
  benefits_3_desc: "We send the proceeds to any bank on the next business day. Inside PAYSUNION - same day.",
  benefits_4_title: "Friendly online personal account",
  benefits_4_desc: "With sales analytics and payment management",
  benefits_5_title: "Personal banker",
  benefits_6_title: "Continuous growth and development of functionality"
};

sourcesContent:
export default {
 title: 'Internet acquiring',
 desc: 'We have flexible and modular acquiring solution with PAYSUNION will ensure the high efficiency of your payment processes.',
 sub_item_1: "We have set of technologically advanced services for accepting payments on the Internet, aimed at the optimal solution of various business needs of payment service providers.",
 sub_item_2: "Our modular solution has ability for customising and adapting to the needs of each client. Our modular solution provided through the scalable API, in which new functions are added every month that increase the capabilities of your applications.",
 sub_item_3: "We understand how important fast integration and high availability of the service in e-commerce. Therefore, PAYSUNION offers a quick procedure for registering and concluding a contract for servicing a merchant, and ready-to-implement technological solutions for payment cards acceptance for quick integration of merchants. Thus, we will ensure high efficiency of payment processes for your business.",
 benefits: "PAYSUNION Internet Acquiring advantages:",
 benefits_1_title: "Connection within 2 days",
 benefits_1_desc: "Ready-to-implement CMS and SDK modules for mobile applications, functional API", 
 benefits_2_title: "24/7 support",
 benefits_2_desc: "We answer by phone or chat", 
 benefits_3_title: "Fast money transfer",
 benefits_3_desc: "We send the proceeds to any bank on the next business day. Inside PAYSUNION - same day.", 
 benefits_4_title: "Friendly online personal account",
 benefits_4_desc: "With sales analytics and payment management", 
 benefits_5_title: "Personal banker",
 benefits_6_title: "Continuous growth and development of functionality",
}
